story_1: With a speed like a supercharged race car and a unique zig-zaggy path, Zoomy darts through space, leaving stardust behind!
story_2: Zoomy blasts through space at an incredible speedâ€”about 157,800 km/h! ğŸŒªï¸ That's fast enough to zoom around the Earth 4 times in just one hour! Every year, Zoomy travels a whopping 876 million kilometersâ€”more than 22,000 trips around the planet! ğŸŒ
story_3: Zoomy isn't a perfect snowball in the skyâ€”it's more like a stretched-out pancake! With its long, skinny shape, Zoomy stretches out when it gets far from the Sun and swoops in close when it returns. Its eccentric orbit gives it that cool, elliptical look!
